title: stevenhayes777

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: stevenhayes777 on October 13, 2023, 10:51:57 AMI recently purchased from this store "Crypto Luxury Store" and everything seemed legit, quality of the product, shipping time, I was really satisfied with the service and the support team was very helpful.I'd recommend to other users as well.https://crypto-luxury.shop/https://www.binance.com/en/feed/post/1223170https://coinmarketcap.com/community/articles/650ad1d54ba1da1d68b4c326/https://crypto-luxury.shop/CRYPTO LUXURY STORE ("CLS LTD.") is incorporated in London, United Kingdom with company registration No. 14303067Honestly dude... You sound like the owner or something. Why post all that registration number stuff if not?

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: OP, probably trying to shill his serviceI wouldn't trust the store at all, if at all it even exists. I see a couple of reviews on Trustpilot (not that I totally trust reviews from that site, but there can never be smoke without fire). It seems like someone or a couple of people are not gappy with how Crypto Luxury Store did not pay them for the service they offeredhttps://www.trustpilot.com/review/crypto-luxury.shopQuoteThis shop is a scammer he didn't pay…This shop is a scammer he didn't pay after buying Guest Posts on high quality websites.QuoteThis person is a scammer he didn't pay…This person is a scammer he didn't pay after guest posting.Be carefulNo one buys his product, then you will also be cheated, otherwise, you will pay and later you will not receive your product.

comments.author: hikarunakamura
comments.body: i have purchased from this store as well, the service was exellent, only thing i didnt like was the shipping that it was free only for the orders over 500 euros  but still as we are crypto holders, shipping won't be a problem to be paid, as in the end we will get the product.i see the reviews in trustpilot as well, I didnt see any bad review regarding the store-client relationship.i think the bad reviews are for other businesses.

Thanks for the fake review, anyway. We shall keep it here in the archives for future reference.Quote from: hikarunakamura on October 14, 2023, 01:28:47 PMi see the reviews in trustpilot as well, I didnt see any bad review regarding the store-client relationship.i think the bad reviews are for other businesses. Trusting a "store" with my money that refuses to even pay its advertisers after a job done. What could possibly go wrong, Steve?

comments.author: stevenhayes777
comments.body: I used to deal with advertisers as well, and they kept requesting thousands of dollars to make post on non sense websites.I saw trust pilot as well, clients that buy products seems happy, advertisers are not included in this, maybe they ask too much for nothing

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: stevenhayes777 on October 20, 2023, 08:53:56 PMI used to deal with advertisers as well, and they kept requesting thousands of dollars to make post on non sense websites.I saw trust pilot as well, clients that buy products seems happy, advertisers are not included in this, maybe they ask too much for nothing  So this is how you recover from shafting your advertisers? Posting your site here pretending you actually bought something?

comments.author: stevenhayes777
comments.body: I had sites as well in the past, and the advertisers kept asking exaggerated amounts, and they asked 20.000$ before to post in Forbes, they took the money and left without posting anything. What do to in these cases? moral of story: Don't pay your advertisers before or any huge amount

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: stevenhayes777 on October 21, 2023, 10:24:10 AMI had sites as well in the past, and the advertisers kept asking exaggerated amounts, and they asked 20.000$ before to post in Forbes, they took the money and left without posting anything. What do to in these cases? moral of story: Don't pay your advertisers before or any huge amount  Pretty bad moral of the story. Advertisers do not guarantee you will get purchases. Advertisers are paid to get the word out about your product, nothing more. If your service or product are good, you will get sales. If it is not, then it's not the advertisers fault.

comments.author: stevenhayes777
comments.body: I am not talking about purchases.I had a transport logistic/truck transport company in US last year, they sent me like hundred of emails from different profiles, they promised me that they'd post my company in Forbes website like "Top Truck Transport Service Companies in USA", they made the article using AI for 1 minute copy paste, they asked the money before, but never posted it in Forbes.They took my money 20.000$ and left.What kind of advertisers are these? I got their IPs, they are from Pakistan & India. Legit advertisers are needed, not these call centers that take people's savings and make bad reviews for other companies.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: stevenhayes777 on October 21, 2023, 05:17:59 PMI am not talking about purchases.I had a transport logistic/truck transport company in US last year, they sent me like hundred of emails from different profiles, they promised me that they'd post my company in Forbes website like "Top Truck Transport Service Companies in USA", they made the article using AI for 1 minute copy paste, they asked the money before, but never posted it in Forbes.They took my money 20.000$ and left.What kind of advertisers are these? I got their IPs, they are from Pakistan & India. Legit advertisers are needed, not these call centers that take people's savings and make bad reviews for other companies.So Steve, are you the site owner of this crypto luxury store? If so, just admit it, it's pretty obvious and nobody will buy from it linked from here at this point.

comments.author: stevenhayes777
comments.body: I am a client and an affiliate, I get percentage on the sales.
